contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|type=bacteria|date=December 2009}} {{Taxobox | name = Purple sulfur bacteria | regnum = [[Bacteria]] | phylum = [[Proteobacteria]] | classis = [[Alphaproteobacteria]] | ordo = '''Rhodospirillales''' | subdivision_ranks = Families | subdivision = [[Rhodospirillaceae]]<br> [[Acetic acid bacteria|Acetobacteraceae]] }} The '''Rhodospirillales''' is an order of [[Proteobacteria]], with two families: the [[Acetobacteraceae]] and the [[Rhodospirillaceae]].<ref>[http://www.bacterio.cict.fr/qr/rhodospirillales.html LPSN]</ref> The Acetobacteraceae comprise the [[acetic acid bacteria]], which are [[heterotrophic]] and produce [[acetic acid]] during their respiration.<ref name=BergeyAlpha>Garrity, George M.; Brenner, Don J.; Krieg, Noel R.; Staley, James T. (eds.) (2005). Bergey's Manual of Systematic Bacteriology, Volume Two: The Proteobacteria, Part C: The Alpha-, Beta-, Delta-, and Epsilonproteobacteria. New York, New York: Springer. ISBN 978-0-387-24145-6.</ref> The [[Rhodospirillaceae]] include mainly [[purple bacteria|purple non-sulfur bacteria]], which produce energy through [[photosynthesis]].<ref name=BergeyAlpha /> ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:Rhodospirillales|*]] {{Proteobacteria-stub}}
